GSD.product_version: versions from v5.19 to before v5.19.6
GSD.description:
arm64/sme: Don't flush SVE register state when allocating SME storage

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.19.6 by commit a8d79f9d1a4d90b7b4eb8bf7aa61995359aeb02e, it was introduced in version v5.19 by commit 8bd7f91c03d886f41d35f6108078d20be5a4a1bd. For more details please see the references link.
